main event: Several observers reported seeing multiple green lights over Lake Erie on 29 August 1967.
interesting points: The lights were described as round and star-sized, emitting a green light, and constantly changing in appearance., The observation lasted for about three hours and fifteen minutes., Inquiry with the Cleveland Coast Guard confirmed no official boats were present in the area at that time., There were smaller private boats in the vicinity of the sighting., The conclusion suggested the lights might have been searchlights engaged in a search for a distressed vessel.
sighted object: several green lights in the sky
